Documents/Programming/ProtocolsObjC/SSDragDestinationTextViewDelegate.h

00001 @class SSDragDestinationTextView ;
00002 
00003 @protocol SSDragDestinationTextViewDelegate
00004 
00005 - (BOOL)performDragOperation:(id <NSDraggingInfo>)sender
00006                                  destination:(SSDragDestinationTextView*)destination ;
00007 /*
00008  This method should be implemented the same as -[NSObject performDragOperation]
00009  except that it has the additional argument which allows the dragging destination
00010  NSView to be distinguished, so that one delegate may serve multiple dragging
00011  destination NSViews.
00012  If the dragging destination NSView responds to -delegate, that delegate will get this
00013  message.  Otherwise, if delegate of the dragging destination NSView's -window responds,
00014  that delegate of its window will get it.
00015  */
00016 
00017 @end
00018
